attributes.action: to allow parents to spank a child ONCE behind a botton in case of gross misconduct
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now, children can not be punished even for gross miscondict [i.e. vandalism, putting legs onto seats in public transport, sewaring to parents, etc.] can not be punished. This stressless bringing up lead to bring up bandits because children know they can not be punished so they can do everything they want....
Petition is to allow by law parents to spank a child ONCE behind a botton in case of gross misconduct - there must be something to enforce discipline and order. If this will not be implemented children crime will be worse and worse!!!
Of course in case of exceeding punishment stated severe consequences would apply to parents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
